title: People Don't Perform Best When Not Inspired
text:
Leadership People Don't Perform Best When Not Inspired Bob Habeeb, president and CEO of First Hospitality Group, Inc., says the best companies have the happiest employees. --- Shares March 2, 2017 
First Hospitality Group, Inc. is a nationally recognized hotel management company providing management, acquisition, development and receivership services to a variety of hotels. Bob Habeeb, president and CEO, believes that 90 percent of what you learn is absorbed by the time you leave home and credits that all to his father. The best piece of advice he could give to someone is to realize that it’s all about people and how you treat them. What’s one thing that Bob has learned from the worst boss he has had? Find out. 
Related: Hard Work Will Never Fail You
